Package in.co.rays.model

Class UserModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.co.rays.model.UserModel
  • public class UserModel
extends java.lang.Object
    UserModel class provides methods to perform CRUD operations on UserBean objects. It includes user authentication, password management, and registration functionalities. This class uses JDBC for database interaction and Log4j for logging.

    • Field Summary

      • changePassword

        public boolean changePassword​(java.lang.Long id,
                              java.lang.String oldPassword,
                              java.lang.String newPassword)
                       throws RecordNotFoundException,
                              ApplicationException
        Changes the password for a user.
        Parameters:
        id - user ID
        oldPassword - old password
        newPassword - new password
        Returns:
        true if password changed successfully
        Throws:
        RecordNotFoundException - if user not found
        ApplicationException - if an application error occurs

      • forgetPassword

        public boolean forgetPassword​(java.lang.String login)
                       throws ApplicationException,
                              RecordNotFoundException
        Sends the forgotten password to user's email.
        Parameters:
        login - login ID of the user
        Returns:
        true if email sent successfully
        Throws:
        ApplicationException - if an application error occurs
        RecordNotFoundException - if user not found
